https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/v8mskmoqzkJx825YxNt8ItxGIY4.jpg Filled with warmth, humor, whimsy, and just a touch of magic, A Mermaid for Christmas combines classic Christmas themes with an escapist fantasy element that only a mermaid can provide! A Mermaid for Christmas
